Table	Create Table
whatsapp_instances	CREATE TABLE `whatsapp_instances` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `merchant_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `instance_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `token` text NOT NULL,
  `api_url` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'https://api.green-api.com',
  `phone_number` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `webhook_url` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('active','inactive','pending','expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `is_primary` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `last_sync_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `connected_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `expires_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `metadata` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `whatsapp_instances_merchant_id_merchants_id_fk` (`merchant_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `whatsapp_instances_merchant_id_merchants_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`merchant_id`) REFERENCES `aEd97Sv38TzpxF76sMza4k`.`merchants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=210001
